Class Reservation

java.lang.Object
Reservation
public class Reservation extends Object
Represents a hotel reservation with guest information, dates, and pricing.

  • Constructor Details

    • Reservation

      public Reservation(String guestName, Date checkInDate, Date checkOutDate, Room room)
      Constructor to initialize a Reservation with guest details, check-in/out dates, and the booked room. Calculates totalPrice, numberOfNights, and pricePerNight based on room price and duration of stay.
      Parameters:
      guestName - The name of the guest making the reservation.
      checkInDate - The check-in Date object.
      checkOutDate - The check-out Date object.
      room - The Room object that is booked for this reservation.

  • Method Details

    • calculatedTotalPrice

      public double calculatedTotalPrice()
      Retrieves the total computed price of the reservation.
      Returns:
      The total price of the reservation.

    • setTotalPrice

      public void setTotalPrice(double totalPrice)
      Sets the total price of the reservation.
      Parameters:
      totalPrice - The new total price.

    • TotalPrice

      public double TotalPrice()
      Retrieves the total price of the reservation with discount or not.
      Returns:
      The total price.

    • guestName

      public String guestName()
      Retrieves the name of the guest for this reservation.
      Returns:
      The guest's name.

    • getDetailedPriceBreakdown

      private String getDetailedPriceBreakdown()

    • displayConfirmation

      public String displayConfirmation(Reservation reserved)
      Generates and returns a confirmation message detailing the reservation information.
      Parameters:
      reserved - The Reservation object to generate confirmation for.
      Returns:
      A confirmation message as a String.

    • applyDiscount

      public String applyDiscount(String discountCode)
      Applies a discount code to the reservation if the code is valid and not previously used.
      Parameters:
      discountCode - The discount code to apply.
      Returns:
      A message indicating the result of the discount application.
